ComicInfo.Summary:
Preston uncovers a secret from Deadpool's past that needs immediate attention! But Deadpool and Dazzler are still fighting off Dracula's forces!
The Guardians of the Galaxy (Rocket Raccoon, Groot, and Star Lord) only appear on the GOTG variant cover.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Mark Brooks | 1 | Var | Guardians of the Galaxy Variant Cover | Alex Maleev | 2 |
